headline: California Governor Joins Those Wanting to Ban Flavored E-Cigarettes
summary: California Gov. Gavin Newsom said he would sign a bill banning flavored e-cigarettes if the state legislature sent one his way.

headline: ‘SNL’ Fires New Cast Member After Slurs Surface Online

summary: President Trump notified Congress on Monday that the U.S. and Japan were prepared to enter a limited agreement that would lower some tariffs and set terms of digital trade.
